quotes.quote: Dreams and needs tear down fortress of impossibility.
We all need somewhere where we feel safe.
We need to wash the feet of our enemies.
What you need and what you want aren't the same things.

We need to take things personally. We need to stop putting profits above people. We need to stop putting greed above need. We need to stop putting the rule of gold above the golden rule. We need to treat people as people and not as problems.
Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.
All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
You may need to change your dreams.
We need time so to can explain the stuff in easy way.
We need to start preparing ourselves for the changes we are anticipating in our society
We need houses as we need clothes, architecture stimulates fashion. It's like hunger and thirst â€“ you need them both.
To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
Sometimes we need the salt of tears to remind us how to savor the sweetness of life.
Need nothing and then see what happens.
Sometimes all you need is a hug from the right person... and all your stress will melt away.
We need to remember not to give the devil a chance and fall away from God's grace.
What we need now is endless courage.
Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
Need is not transitive, one may need without oneself being needed.
Women rarely need the things they want.
Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
Women need real moments of solitude and self reflection to balance out how much of ourselves we give away.
People need something or someone to fasten themselves to in order to reassure themselves that they are real
We need a shift in our message and in our pulpit.
Sometimes, you need to be alone. Not to be lonely, but to enjoy your free time being yourself.
We need to rediscover the idea of the common good and work together to build a home.

We need no fanciful teaching regarding the personality of God. What God desires us to know of Him is revealed in His word and His works. The beautiful things of nature reveal His character and His power as Creator.
We need to go through all the processes in order to understand what our calling is.
As the needs of all living things must, we have proved that it is a very safe thing to trust in the Lord our God.
